CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-01-27 15:03
Subject: Introducing Echo, Our new phishing button, Stella McCartney Sale, VoP reminder
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/306160b0f6d84adf860c36952c1316791839013729.png> 	
Introducing Echo! 

Your new AI-powered chatbot has landed, designed specifically to assist you with all-things People & Culture. Echo puts quick, reliable answers at your fingertips, making receiving answers to your P&C queries faster and easier than ever.

What Makes Echo Stand Out:

*	Accessible: Find Echo directly on Microsoft Teams (web & mobile).
*	Multilingual: Supports responses in over 100 languages.
*	Easy to Use: Just type your questions to get instant responses.
*	Knowledgeable: Offering ChatGPT capabilities but built by us and tailored specifically to the Group.
*	Confidential: Fully secure and private. 

Click below for a step-by-step guide on how to get started #AskEcho

Stay Secure with our new phishing button

This new feature, available to everyone, makes it easier than ever to report suspicious or potentially harmful phishing emails directly from your Outlook application.

Stay vigilant, and thank you for playing a key role in keeping us secure!

chunks.text:
As we step into a new year, it's time to reflect on your workplace experience and share your insights by participating in the Voice of the People Survey.

Your honest feedback will help us celebrate what we’re doing well and identify areas where we can grow and improve together.

The survey is voluntary, confidential, and will only take about 10 minutes to complete. All responses will be reported collectively, ensuring your privacy.

If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out to your people partner or contact us at People.Experience@chalhoub.com.

Take the survey! <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%2Fmtracking%2Flinkref.php%3Flink1id%3D167%26user%3D10620&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C5315e80cde0349e10a0308dd3ec24b00%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638735726374495561%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=wnns4FZ%2FPJPjdT85f2syLm6DnezITD8crJQ0Ul33mks%3D&reserved=0>
